item.title: Bob Marley - Get Up Stand Up - Key of Dm - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Get Up Stand Up by Bob Marley from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: Am, Dm.

item.description: Play along video for the song How Can I Get Over by Pure Heart from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D.

item.description: Play along video for the song 10-Oct by Paolo Nutini from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: C, F, G7.

item.description: Play along video for the song Three Little Birds by Bob Marley & The Wailers from the channel Kevin Way. Chords used in the song: A, D, E7.

item.description: Play along video for the song Waiting In Vain by Bob Marley from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A♯m7, Cm7, C♯, C♯maj7, D♯, G♯maj7.
